name: Usul
headline: Win defense contracts with AI
description:
Usul is the all-in-one platform to win defense contracts.

We help governments adopt defense technologies faster than ever before.

Get started at https://www.usul.com/

founders.name: Jarren Reid, Founder
founders.description: CEO & Co-Founder @ USUL | Prev: Stanford CS, Palantir, MITRE

founders.name: Oliver Gomez, Founder
founders.description: CPO & Co-Founder @ USUL | Prev: Stanford CS AI + Econ, Palantir, Product at ex-YC company

founders.name: Joonghyun Lee, Founder
founders.description: Chief Engineer & CTO @ USUL (S24). Ex: UMich ECE and Stanford Aero/Astro.

# Your Pentagon Whisperer Has Arrived
Usul is the first platform to size defense markets, map key stakeholders, and identify relevant opportunities—all in one place.
[Book a Demo](https://www.usul.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cmq7-4sg-b57/usul-product-call>)[Explore Features](https://www.usul.com/<#Features>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6732a876e4999d561f2b7232_Group%201171277464.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6732c2f8d0b371b9d225b72e_Group%202%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6732abf5843403c9d26a7849_Group%201171277465.svg)
10x
Your defense market insights to increase your probability of win.
## Your AI-Powered Defense Analyst
Every defense insight you need to strategically plan your pursuits, in one intuitive platform for all.
## Pursuit Management
Manage your federal sales pipeline across business development, capture, and executive teams for board reporting.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Identify relevant key stakeholders and funding offices.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Calculate your Total Addressable Markets (TAMs).
[Learn more](https://www.usul.com/</pursuit-management>)
## Defense Budget Tracking
Easily understand how the DoD has allocated money for your product area before contracts get released.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Find pots of DoD money with the highest Percentage Win.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Identify which companies are winning similar programs.
[Learn more](https://www.usul.com/</defense-budget-tracking>)
## Personal Contract Inbox
Wake up every morning to personalized RFPs, RFIs, RFQs, and more, tailored to your product specifications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Never miss a government contract opportunity again.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Collaborate on your pursuits across capture and BD.
[Learn more](https://www.usul.com/</smart-contract-search>)
## Stakeholder Intelligence
Identify every relevant government buyers contact information at your fingertips.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Program Executive Offices (PEOs).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Government buyer champions and end-user champions.
[Learn more](https://www.usul.com/</stakeholder-intelligence>)
## Industry Days
Never miss an industry day, conference, or government-oriented event again.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Personalized industry day calendar for your capabilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Explore directories of past events and speaker agendas.
[Learn more](https://www.usul.com/</industry-days>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6732a8f3f1596b9dcf6f3928_Frame%201%20\(1\).png)
## We Connect Everything
We connect Usul with your favorite sources, including DoD Comptroller, USA Spending, Sam.gov, PEO press releases, congressional hearings, GAO reports, News & more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Government-verified data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Your own uploaded data.
[See all Integrations](https://www.usul.com/</integrations-usul>)
## Mission-Critical AI Built for the Beltway
Whether you're a defense company, consultant, lobbyist, or investor, Usul is designed to provide full market transparency for your desired capability.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77bc2_world.svg)Defense Companies and StartupsIdentify programs with money allocated to your capability, contact key stakeholders, and wake up to personalized contracts.](https://www.usul.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77bb6_trending-up%20\(5\).svg)Consultants, Lobbyists and InvestorsManage your portfolio of federal clients and understand how the government market is responding to their capabilities. ](https://www.usul.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77bb9_users%20\(10\).svg)Government BuyersSource the most innovative commercial capabilities, identify overlaps in program spend, and collaborate with likeminded stakeholders.](https://www.usul.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ecd926ceb6abaee8de6a_predator-b-block-5-1920x1280.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6720235217192d20d97ebdcd_GettyImages_975466978.0.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6716e3e2120ecb00421a1325_building-US-Capitol-Washington-DC.webp)
## Personalized For Your Capabilities
Manage your entire product suite or portfolio of companies.
[Explore Campaigns](https://www.usul.com/<#>)
1
### Configure Company Profile
Upload product specifications, statements of work, or other company materials.
2
### We Generate Context
In a few seconds, we generate a profile for every product you sell to the government.
3
### Manage Your Products
Organize your federal pursuits across your entire product suite.
## War Room Security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Encryption across your queries and responses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77b12_circle-check-filled%20\(4\).svg)
Our system doesn't train on user-uploaded data. 
# Made For Your Mission
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/67180c8ac85cedd2b94d9b74_Frame%201321317589.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/67180c8af483344739d37a18_Frame%201321317585.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/671b02a0de4581c6e9912a0b_Frame%201321317586%20\(3\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/67180c8a252f3572c89847bf_Frame%201321317588.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/67180c8ab2eea95135887808_Frame%201321317587.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6711ba4f8b9b4fcb4db77a37/67180d797dd5f153ac281e45_Frame%201321317590%20\(1\).png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Usul**

Founded in 2024 and as a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Usul has set out on an ambitious mission: to streamline how defense contracts are won using cutting-edge AI technology. With a small but dedicated team of just three members, Usul is already making waves in the defense industry by helping governments and defense companies navigate the complex landscape of contract opportunities.

**Mission and Vision**

Usul aims to assist governments in adopting defense technologies more rapidly and efficiently. The unique proposition of Usul lies in its all-in-one platform that consolidates crucial information—allowing businesses to size defense markets, identify key stakeholders, and explore contract opportunities all in one place. Think of it as your personal Pentagon whisperer.

**Key Features**

At the core of Usul’s offering are several powerful features:

1. **Pursuit Management**: This feature helps manage federal sales pipelines, enabling seamless collaboration across business development and executive teams.
   
2. **Defense Budget Tracking**: Monitors how the Department of Defense allocates funding, providing insights on where opportunities lie before contracts are officially released.
   
3. **Personal Contract Inbox**: Users receive tailored requests for proposals (RFPs), requests for information (RFIs), and pricing requests (RFQs)—ensuring no potential contract slips through the cracks.
   
4. **Stakeholder Intelligence**: Offers extensive databases on key contacts within the government, from Program Executive Offices (PEOs) to senior buyer champions.
   
5. **Industry Days**: Keeps users updated on industry conferences and key events that matter to their pursuits.

**Deep Integration with Data Sources**

What really sets Usul apart is its capacity to integrate data from various trusted sources such as the DoD Comptroller and USA Spending, ensuring that users have access to verified information. 

**Who Can Benefit?**

Whether you’re a defense contractor hunting for money allocated to your capabilities, a consultant managing federal client portfolios, or a government buyer looking for innovative solutions, Usul provides the necessary tools to navigate the defense landscape effectively.

**Location and Leadership**

While the company operates out of an unspecified location, it thrives under the guidance of Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator, contributing to its strategic direction in the competitive field of defense technology.

**The Bottom Line**

If you're looking to capture more defense contracts with a data-driven approach, Usul is ready to help.
